column5: Warm open space guesthouse cultured as a meditation and massage studio for 20+ years. The space is filled with natural light with a vaulted, shiplap ceiling while offering a restful view onto our garden and gold fish pond. Small refrigerator, microwave, Keurig, toaster oven, towel warmer, hair dryer and bicycles to tour north Oak Cliff and the Bishop Arts District. Hot tub included, yoga and massage services available, if desired.
